original_title: Meat Puppets: Alive in the Nineties
overview: Musicians everywhere have been swearing up and down by the mastery of the puppets for many years. Like some kind of secret club that you need a password and a secret handshake to join, here is your decoder ring. Moments of magical Meat Puppets adventures captured from time and served digitally in 5.1 surround sound. Catch 'em in front of big and small crowds from arenas to record stores, from electric assault to acoustic jammin. Pop it in your player and feel alive like you're right there in the nineties surrounded by Meatheads.
title: Meat Puppets: Alive in the Nineties
